name: Final Disaster - Tornado Scene
description:
The tornado blew all things, nothing around you, no blocks, no animals, no power. But wait, they come back!  Survive! Avoid danger around YOU!

Controls: click-touch TILES around player in 4 directions, he will move if it can. Use you brain!

PLEASE DONT PLAY IN MOBILE BRAAAAAAWSER!!

Done with Defold Engine.

Music Sawsquarenoise "OverHeated Alfa 0.2. OST" "Interstellar"
from http://freemusicarchive.org/music/sawsquarenoise/OverHeated_Alfa_02/Interstellar
